title: Knife, Fork, 18th century
markings: On blade (a): "F & E Marcus, SolingeN CB"
provenance: Formerly in the Wallace Nutting Collection
dimensions:
(a) cm: L: 19.7 x W: 1.9 x Diam:1.9'
(b) cm: L: 17.7 x W: 1.9 x Diam: 1.9
description:
knife (a): Slightly curved rounded steel blade and tapering tubular porcelain handle. Nickel socket. Blue and white porcelain handle comprising stylized blue flowers and sprigs on a white ground.
fork (b): three tine fork and tubular tapering porcelain handle, nickel socket. Blue and white handle decorated wtih stylized blue flowers on a white ground.
